metadata.title: CVE-2016-0846 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: libs/binder/IMemory.cpp in the IMemory Native Interface in Android 4.xbefore 4.4.4, 5.0.x before 5.0.2, 5.1.x before 5.1.1, and 6.x before2016-04-01 does not properly consider the heap size, which allows attackersto gain privileges via a crafted application, as demonstrated by obtainingSignature or SignatureOrSystem access, aka internal bug 26877992.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
